ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He swore to them, 'I am one of those who give you good advice.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then he said to them on oath: "I am your sincere friend;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And he swore to them both: 'Surely I am your sincere adviser.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Satan swore before them that he was giving them good advice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And he swore to them, “Indeed I am a well-wisher for both of you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And he Qasamahuma: "Verily, I am one of the sincere well-wishers for you both."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And he swore to them both: Most surely I am a sincere adviser to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And he swore to them, 'Truly, I am for you a sincere adviser.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he swore unto them (saying): Lo! I am a sincere adviser unto you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and he swore to them, "Surely, I am your well-wisher."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And he sware unto them both: verily I am unto you of your good counsellors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And he swore to them, ‘I am indeed your well-wisher.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And he swore to them both, that he was their sincere adviser.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And he [Shaitan (Satan)] swore by Allah to them both (saying): "Verily, I am one of the sincere well-wishers for you both."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: he swore to both: 'Indeed, I am to you among the advisers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And he swore to them, “I am a sincere advisor to you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And he swore [by Allah] to them, "Indeed, I am to you from among the sincere advisors."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:21] And he swore to both of them, that is, he swore to both of them by God, ‘Truly, I am a sincere adviser to you’, in this matter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he swore unto them (saying): Lo! I am a sincere adviser unto you) in my oath that this is the tree of immortality. 158
